description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent for generating movie scripts with a specific model, and executes a sample run to generate a script based on the input 'New York'.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: json_mode_agent
methods.description: An Agent instance configured to generate movie scripts in JSON mode using the specified model and response schema.

methods.name: run
methods.description: A RunResponse object obtained by executing the agent with the input 'New York', containing the generated script content.
